## Hackathon 2021

This document is to practice working with Seurat.

```{r packages, echo=FALSE}
library(Seurat)
library(dplyr)
library(dittoSeq)
library(ggplot2) 
library(ggrepel)
library(DESeq2)
library(patchwork)
```

```{r read_data}
load(paste0(dir_prefix,"merged_E1_liver_singlets_merged_processed_bsAMSd.RData"))
```
